seed_pair.known: Do you want to go to a restaurant tonight?

recent_seed_pairs.known: Nothing seems to be working since we tried to fix it.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 自从我们试图修理它以来，似乎什么都不工作了。

recent_seed_pairs.known: She was very kind when she saw me feeling nervous.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 当她看到我感到紧张时，她非常友好。

recent_seed_pairs.known: He wasn't very patient when I couldn't answer.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 当我不能回答时，他不是很耐心。

recent_seed_pairs.known: This isn't very difficult, so I hope you'll finish soon.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 这不是很难，所以我希望你很快完成。

recent_seed_pairs.known: Can you tell me what your name is?
recent_seed_pairs.target: 你能告诉我你的名字是什么吗？

recent_seed_pairs.known: That wasn't what I was hoping would happen.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 那不是我希望会发生的事。

recent_seed_pairs.known: I would have done it differently if I had known what you wanted.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 如果我知道你想要什么，我会做得不同。

recent_seed_pairs.known: I wouldn't have said it in exactly the same way.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 我不会用完全相同的方式说它。

recent_seed_pairs.known: Where do you want to meet on Saturday night?
recent_seed_pairs.target: 你想在星期六晚上在哪里见面？

recent_seed_pairs.known: I don't mind waiting for a few minutes tomorrow morning.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 我不介意明天早上等几分钟。
